data.Name: Sierra Ferrell
data.Bio: Sierra Ferrell (born on 3 August 1988) is an American singer-songwriter based in Nashville, TN. Growing up in West Virginia, Ferrell got her start inging Shania Twain songs in a local bar at the age of seven, and left home in her early 20s to journey across the US with a troupe of wandering musicians. After years of living in her van and busking on the streets of New Orleans and Seattle, Ferrell moved to Nashville and started landing gigs there. Read more on Last.fm
